snippet.textDisplay: On a side note does anyone know why they cut out most of the interactions with other animal/villagers? It used to be that you would always do favors for them and got to know the characters that way. I believe that the previous game in the series got rid of this and I was hoping that it would be back in New Horizons but it isn't. :(
snippet.textOriginal: On a side note does anyone know why they cut out most of the interactions with other animal/villagers? It used to be that you would always do favors for them and got to know the characters that way. I believe that the previous game in the series got rid of this and I was hoping that it would be back in New Horizons but it isn't. :(

snippet.textDisplay: Thank you for posting a song from New Horizons. After a really bad month of March with my grandma passing away, this game could not have come out at a more perfect time.  I decided to name my island Ryoshima keeping in line with my theme of naming my Animal Crossing towns/island after locales in Okami/Okamiden.
snippet.textOriginal: Thank you for posting a song from New Horizons. After a really bad month of March with my grandma passing away, this game could not have come out at a more perfect time.  I decided to name my island Ryoshima keeping in line with my theme of naming my Animal Crossing towns/island after locales in Okami/Okamiden.

snippet.textDisplay:
What you do is something simple, but extremely influential. Doing my own VGM list and following others has helped me discover games I would have otherwise never considered playing.
And even though I don't have the time and willpower anymore, you still keep uploading choice tracks to spread the word of wonderful games or unique opinions, and keep everyone's spirits up.
I always listen to your library of chosen VGM to listen to as I draw, and I often find myself surprised by great songs I've never heard before.
Even now in this dark time, you make an excellent choice to put something as evocative and pleasant as this for your #2400. I think this small thing's gonna be remembered for a long time by all of us.
I failed in something so simple as making my own list, but you still keep yours going strong. Well done. ^^
Keep up the good work.
snippet.textOriginal:

And even though I don't have the time and willpower anymore, you still keep uploading choice tracks to spread the word of wonderful games or unique opinions, and keep everyone's spirits up.
I always listen to your library of chosen VGM to listen to as I draw, and I often find myself surprised by great songs I've never heard before.
Even now in this dark time, you make an excellent choice to put something as evocative and pleasant as this for your #2400. I think this small thing's gonna be remembered for a long time by all of us.
I failed in something so simple as making my own list, but you still keep yours going strong. Well done. ^^
Keep up the good work.

snippet.textDisplay:
I feel the same way as well. This channel and the games I’ve played over the course of my lifetime have inspired me to create music playlist of my own.

Although, with over more than 2000 tracks saved, it can be tough to manage. I pull through though, and try to update it constantly.

snippet.textDisplay: I've been working on the #2400 video as I usually do for x00 uploads, but it just didn't feel right with everything that's been going on. I pretty much had the blank page syndrome, so I decided to go with something simple. I will keep the other one for #2500 instead (it was a different franchise). Animal Crossing not only deserves a x00 spot, but the timing is actually perfect with New Horizons releasing during such an unprecedented time of social distancing. We are all in this together despite the distance, we will get through this and I truly wish you all the best! I get so many great messages of support regarding the list helping people with the situation while they work from home and that only serves as additional motivation. Uploads will be resuming as usual.
snippet.textOriginal: I've been working on the #2400 video as I usually do for x00 uploads, but it just didn't feel right with everything that's been going on. I pretty much had the blank page syndrome, so I decided to go with something simple. I will keep the other one for #2500 instead (it was a different franchise). Animal Crossing not only deserves a x00 spot, but the timing is actually perfect with New Horizons releasing during such an unprecedented time of social distancing. We are all in this together despite the distance, we will get through this and I truly wish you all the best! I get so many great messages of support regarding the list helping people with the situation while they work from home and that only serves as additional motivation. Uploads will be resuming as usual.
